"Yes, and some will never heal." She leans against the wall, looking 
at them, considering their offer.

> Windlord::
> 
> "I'm afraid that wounds are deep"said gloomy Windlord
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Gimliyotoden@a... wrote:

> quiet for 
> > some time.
